body:
Well as you may know Team Allah uses Discord for scrims. We barely use it, and we haven't been seeing much activity for scrims and stuff. However there is a Skype chat to look for scrims, and that's not the point. 

Even if shadowolf has his own Community Discord (cant find the link, someone give it or something), what we want to offer is our Discord for teams to have a Voice channel and chat, if Avicus doesn't consider you fulfill the requirements or whatever. We'll give you a rank and stuff, post your discord tag below if you want to be added. It will probs end up being used as a lfs tool too. (its kind of a competitive community disc ) 

My Discord tag is tomqss#4403 if anything.

Post below if u want a rank and channel for your team 

https://discord.gg/WFrD7VA is the link, if you go full retard you'll end up banned so dont do stupid shit
